name: Debtor
overview: Once upon a time there was the borrower. Once on a morning run, he got a call on his cell phone. After that, the sports lover became ill and he lost consciousness. Waking up, our hero was in some mysterious place. This mysterious dungeon turned out to be a place of unfulfilled tasks. And our hero's mission was to collect all his debts. The task of the hero to go through 30 levels and collect all the coins, while guarding at the same time clever traps and ruthless enemies. In addition to all, each task is given a dedicated time, which will play against you! To solve all his problems, our hero has a hard forehead with which he can break blocks, well, as well as explosives, with which you can get rid of enemies. Push the boxes, clear your way, solve small puzzles to achieve the goal in the form of an opening door leading to the next level.
